website_summaries.verdict: This revolutionary kids’ nutrition shake addresses all-round growth issues with a formulation that supports healthy weight gain and boosts vertical growth.
pros: Developed by pediatricians and clinically proven to improve healthy growth
High protein and low sugar formula boosts growth without increasing BMI
Free of soy, gluten, corn syrup, human growth hormones, artificial flavors, and colors
Parents of “slow growers” rave about its efficacy
cons: New resealable packaging can be somewhat messy to use

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and works!
customer_reviews.text: My boys (5 and 8) love the taste and they are the world’s pickiest eaters. They are both smaller on the percentile chart as far as weight. A month in and they both gained weight, the pediatrician was thrilled. I will definitely be buying this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Product
customer_reviews.text: This mix is no different from any other weight boosting product. The smell is awful. The taste is awful. I tried to disguise it with ice cream, chocolate syrup, pudding but the smell and taste could not be hidden. My son is not a picky eater, but couldn't stomach this. I did bribe him to drink a small shake made with just milk and the powder and he had stomach pain for the rest of the day. I will not buy this product again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: This is a miracle formula
customer_reviews.text: My son was borderline failure to thrive because of food aversion. We tried the popular store brand liquid shakes, my son threw those up every time. We stumbled across this and tried it. Not only can he keep it down, he loves it! Up until he turned 3 he was still wearing 2T clothes. Now he is growing and he is needing some 4t clothes and he just turned 3 in September. My pediatrician was impressed at his improvement in numbers on the growth chart. Said whatever you are giving him he is responding well so keep giving it to him. This is such a lifesaver. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KayOzz

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 9yr old son who has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9yr old son who has a lack of appetite due to his medication. He absolutely loves the shakes! I will sometimes mix it with peanut butter for some extra protein and flavor. I will purchase product again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Guiles

customer_reviews.title: TASTE LIKE DIRT!!! YUK!! Do NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! My 3 yo and 4 yo hates the taste...I even gave it a tried with their friends...All hated it...said it taste like “ DIRT” I tried to reach customer service for refund- NO RESPONSE. Just lies...nobody likes this ...unless you like eating dirt
customer_reviews.author: William Su

customer_reviews.title: A Winner for a Picky Eater
customer_reviews.text: My son is a very small 12 year old. He is a picky eater and a "super taster" (very sensitive to taste). We have tried everything out there and he is still at least 2 years behind on the growth charts. My main point for buying this was to increase his stomach capacity and nutrient profile. He enjoys the chocolate flavor and will happily drink 2 servings a day with milk. Height is still a slow process but he has gained weight which was the reason for this. This is finally something we don't have a battle over!
customer_reviews.author: P. M.

customer_reviews.title: my son loved the vanilla flavor and finished the container in two ...
customer_reviews.text: i was excited to find this product since my son was born preemie and is a lot smaller than his friends are. my son loved the vanilla flavor and finished the container in two weeks or so, but for some odd reason he just can not drink the chocolate flavor. I'll have to get vanilla from now on. Hope it'll be available next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisay

customer_reviews.title: It has cleared up the ECZEMA that both of my kids have
customer_reviews.text: My kids are extremely picky eaters and in addition to that both had developed eczema. My son who is 9 had it on both of his wrists and my daughter who is 7 had it around her mouth and on her wrists as well. As a result I came across information that mentioned that WHEY has helped some with eczema, I did not think twice about researching a children’s shake that contained whey protein. I came across Healthy Heights and decided to give it a try, not only do the kids LOVE it but their eczema has cleared up about 97% and we have been using the product for 1 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved! My daughter says it tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: So glad that we found Healthy Height Shake. I have been worried about my daughter’s height. She’s a little on the short side so I wanted to find something to help her grow plus provide good nutrition. This shake takes care of both. And my daughter really likes the Vanilla flavoring. Sometimes we add a banana or strawberries. She calls it her “Healthy smoothie”. I tasted it too and I liked it. We plan to try the chocolate one next. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Meza

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: My son needs to grow bc he's short due to his heritage. However, I thought this might help him along. Since he is a picky eater I put 2 scoops in a milk shake and he has no clue. As a matter a fact he says it takes really good and creamy. Just started using this so not sure if it works will write another review. Thank you. Well it's June my son grew 4 inches. We are all so happy and impressed with this product. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!!!! Expensive and taste bad!
customer_reviews.text: I gave two boys and both didn’t like!!!! They wouldn’t even drink it at all!!!! Worst tasting shake!!!!!! I give them shakes everyday too! This product wasn’t cheap either to just taste and throw away. Gave it to a friend... their kids hated it too!!!!! Not even worth one star!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY CONTROL SECOND JAR AWFUL SMELL AND TASTE
customer_reviews.text: So mad that I cannot return this product. The second jar tasted awful. Something is wrong with it. A chemical, plastic smell and taste. Seller, please respond.
customer_reviews.author: inkymuse

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by negative reviews on flavor
customer_reviews.text: I am quite surprised to see so many negative reviews on the flavor. My son has never complained about the flavor and I actually like the flavor myself! The main thing I care about are the results. So I'm just waiting and hoping to see results in height after more time has passed. We need to get consistent with it again. Yes, with two scoops twice per day, you will surely run out fast and it's not exactly cheap. But we do want to try to keep going for a full 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bombshell

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 8 years old. I made him some 4% milk and the shake powder as per instructed. Apparently it has zinc in the powder so it burned his belly all afternoon. I normally use PediSure Growth & Gain and it works fine. The only thing that was that Amazon cancelled the order instantly and I didn't have to ship it back. That was nice. I'm back to PediSure again.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoMarks

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: our 9yo struggles with keeping weight on because he plays multiple sports....so more output than input at times. We had a hard time keeping up with his output, so needed a healthy calorie boost in between meals. Healthy Height has proven to be outstanding at boosting calories - we use it for pre and post game smoothies and it's helped us ensure that he is gaining weight in a healthful way. We are a low sugar family so finding a quality balanced product was important. In the spring season he normally gains NO weight. This year - gained 3 lbs in season. Happy mom.
customer_reviews.author: workingmom

customer_reviews.title: Not good experience
customer_reviews.text: Made my child vomit a lot not sure why :(
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the vanilla flavor and she grew nearly 2.5 inches since she started to include this on her breakfast with almond milk. I will keep buying it for sure, so I know that even if we have to rush to school in the morning, I am giving her the right nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: This got my son up 5% on the height chart!
customer_reviews.text: I started giving my son this earlier this year, maybe Feb-March. He was diagnosed with short stature, had fallen significantly on the growth chart since he was a baby. We just went to his check up and he had put on 2.5''! We last marked his height on the wall the day we started healthy height and it made a real difference. I'm convinced this is what helped him catch up. He loves the taste. The flavor is great. My only problems are the packaging is kind of annoying and the zipper doesn't always close. The price is not ideal but I do believe it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the HEALTHY shake our family has been waiting for. All the other "nutritious" childrens shakes we've tried are loaded with sugar and a bunch of other junk. Admittedly, it did take our picky-eating daughter a handful of tries to like it (assuming because she likes the taste of sugar and corn syrup) but now she absolutely loves it! One thing I didn't realize when purchasing is it's only 4oz/shake which is half the volume of most other shakes. That's been huge in getting our little one to consume the recommended servings. Couldn't recommend more.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old would not drink it
customer_reviews.text: The first night, I mixed 1 scoop with 8 oz of milk (very diluted). My son took 1 sip and refused to drink any more. I did take a sip to see what the fuss was, and it is EXTREMELY sweet, even in it's diluted form. The next morning, I blended 1 scoop with 8 oz of milk, a whole frozen banana, a 1/4 blueberries. He took 3 sips, and gagged each time. Wish he had loved this as others do, but he does not. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerJules

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Im not going to lie, my son still fights me a bit on drinking this, but he does eventually finish the glass! So, all and all, I consider that a win. We tried chocolate first, then vanilla, and he prefers the vanilla. Only on our 3rd week, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: anthony arollo

customer_reviews.title: All you need is water and a shaker!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my very picky 8yr old girl who is now in soccer. Nutrition is important when in sports and cereal isn’t cutting it anymore. I bought it based on great reviews, and didn’t disappoint. My child loves it. She makes it herself. Quick to make, 8 oz. and packed with nutrition. It’s perfect! Drinks it for breakfast, or as a snack. Bought in Vanilla Flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Evy Bellflower, CA

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and solid nutrition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the vanilla and chocolate shake mixes and have had them for 3 weeks now. My two boys like the taste, which is a good start. I like the nutritional profile as well as the research behind the product. It’s too early to tell if their height has increased, but I measured both boys and will keep track as we move forward. At this point I’m just happy they like the taste enough to keep drinking them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos love it, good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - kiddos love it. We did have some trouble with our first attempt at mixing. Thankfully their customer service was great and helped me figure out that because it’s a protein powder I needed to shake it rather than stir it. We just tried it a second time and had much better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Nutritional Product!
customer_reviews.text: Our doctor recommended Carnation Instant Breakfast for extra calories for my daughter. We have given it to her for years. I always felt guilty for giving her all the sugar, corn syrup and other ingredients I couldn't pronounce, but since the doctor recommended I did. When I came across this product with a lot less sugar and high protein. It was a win win. I will say It took a few tries with my daughter to like it. I add banana in the blender. She likes it and Im glad i found it to give her the nutrition she needs. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Son loves shake
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves the taste and looks forward to his shake. He is a super picky eater and doesn’t have much of an appetite. He is also smaller in height (8%) so we are hoping the shake may help. My only complainant is the product is super expensive considering how much shake is provided...Although we haven't been using it as consistently as the product recommends we have seen growth and see the value in the nutritional content of the shake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the taste of this powder! Which is great because it is not a chore trying to get him to drink this. He is lactose intolerant and I was worried about the dairy content mixed in upsetting his stomach but it DOESNT. it’s a miracle. Also, i wanted to say that although i’m not sure how reliable the height increase is, protein is essential for healthy development and i will continue to buy this product knowing this protein is safe for toddlers
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My kids (11 and 12) have been drinking it at night after dinner. They are very picky eaters but they love their milkshake. I’ve only been given it for about 4 months so haven’t seen a huge increase in their weight but at least they enjoy it and I’m glad to be giving them vitamins and minerals that they need. It’s worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 4th, possibly 5th purchase and I can’t rave about this enough! My son is a picky eater every now and then. So I chose this to have on standby whenever he’s being difficult, to me it def helps him build and appetite and pack on healthy weight, as well as boost his height. He loves the taste. I wish they filled the bag a little more than half because it is pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Would give higher rating, but cost is too high!
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the product is fine, but it doesn't make very many servings for the price. VERY expensive for what it is, and my kids' complain because it's grainy, no matter how much we shake it up. Have two containers but will not be purchasing again due to the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: My Picky Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: My Picky Kids love it. They seem to love it because it not chalky like those other powders and doesn't smell funky or look green . It smells of nice vanilla ice-cream and makes real 'smooth' smoothies. But its way expensive than other products and with my two kids this thing gets over pretty soon. I cannot buy it every month but maybe once in 2-3 month due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: HEMANT A

customer_reviews.title: Did my child just grow in a week?
customer_reviews.text: I feel as if he did?!! Sounds ridiculous but I feel as if has worked in a week but probably just a growth spurt haha. It definitely has helped with weight gain. Delicious flavor mix it with Green Vibrance for a healthy child smoothie shake.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not going to lie, I was a little skeptical about this product. My daughter was such a picky eater and hardly ate any of her meals. As soon as I started giving her this shake no later than 2 days I saw a difference! She eats a lot better now! And best thing about it she loves the flavor! I’m on my second order! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Uziel

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate flavor is not good. My son refuses to drink this shake. I even thrived mixing with chocolate syrup, milk and ice to make a shake, and it still tastes bad. I can’t palate the flavor myself. Disappointing for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Both children really hated the taste- I even tired it and it wasn't great. I wish it came in smaller sizes so we could test before buying so much! It will go to waste unfortunately- and I will head to whole foods for something
customer_reviews.author: Keri Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money- tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this would be great for my kids. I read the reviews about the taste and thought it could be masked if putting into a smoothie or something, but I was wrong. There was nothing I could add this powder to that would get my kids to drink it, not even ice cream! Even my one kid that will eat almost anything wouldn't take more than two sips! More than half the bag is still sitting in my cupboard unused and I can't bring myself to throw it away due to the cost. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Latrobe

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from a very picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My child is a very picky eater and doesn’t like to try new food. He did try this and when we ran out he told me that he missed having it because the taste was so good...that says a LOT about how good it tastes. I’ve tried other things with no success. Added bonus he has shown steady growth in height. I feel comfortable with the ingredients and that it’s made by pediatricians. If you are looking for a great tasting source of protein that targets growth in height I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old love this drink ,buying it again !!! No nonsense ingredients. Very less added sugar compared to other similar products in market and i am not paying for just sugar here .
customer_reviews.author: Harsha

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless and waaaaay overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why my wife keeps buying this for our toddler when they're are so many kids shakes out there with equal if not better nutritional value but she also thinks that 2 year olds need to pay $38 for his haircut. If you like to overpay for products with clever marketing. By all means knock yourself out.
customer_reviews.author: GoHawks

customer_reviews.title: Very good weight control drink
customer_reviews.text: My daughter prefers carbs and started to gain weight. She is 10 y o and active. We got this with milk (vanilla flavor) and a bit of a Hershey chocolate syrup. Although my kids are very picky, they seem to love it. They have it every morning before school. They say they are nearly not as hungry as they would be otherwise at school. So far My daughter lost 2 pounds! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter grew nearly 2 inches in 6 months with the help of this. This really helped me a lot. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Young Seok Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hard to trick a picky eater with a chocolate flavor one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a chocolate flavor. My picky eater didn't want to drink it. It tastes good but different from nesquick. And you need to scoops to make a drink. It has a very strong distinctive flavor that's hard to hide.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Villarroel

customer_reviews.title: Taste like cake
customer_reviews.text: Grandkid needed extra nutritional support this product is easy to use and tastes like cake far better than the others no blender needed just shake or stir ordered many times

customer_reviews.title: Arrived rotten/ soured.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived smelling rotten/ soured. Thank goodness I smelled it before I gave it to my child. Could’ve gotten VERY VERY ILL. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Cucumbers527

customer_reviews.title: I really prayed it would work!
customer_reviews.text: It failed disasterously with not only 1 child, but all 3 children. I have an extremely picky eater who's almost two and a so-so picky eater who's 11 year son who hates the taste of milk. So, I was hoping this was the answer. They snubbed their noses. And my 7 year old daughter took one sip and told me, "It's not so good, Mom." Back to drawing board this poor Mom.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ko

customer_reviews.title: Improve kid eating
customer_reviews.text: My son 9 years old is a such picky boy. He only eats few food and he is thin and short compared to the boys in his age. So far he takes health height for 3 months, one bag per month. I mix 1.5 spoons healthy height in milk and give him every morning whatever it lasts for. He fed up this milk mix, but it certainly helped him eats more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old daughter loves this stuff. She thinks it is so yummy. I give her one after lumch or dinner every day and she always looks forward to it. The directions say put 2 scoops in 4-5 oz of milk. I just use a stick blender to blend it up. My daughter also gets up a couple times a night because she is still hungry this helped a lot with that.
customer_reviews.author: Cdizzle

customer_reviews.title: My son didn’t like the taste.
customer_reviews.text: My son doesn’t like it which is a bummer since we have been looking for a way to increase his calories and I thought ‘chocolate milkshakes’ and ‘chocolate milk’ might be a way. It didn’t work for us. He just wanted regular milk rather than try the chocolate milk (he has never had chocolate milk before this either but has been wanting to try it). I am going to try and bake treats with it as another way to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Taste Aweful
customer_reviews.text: Smells and tastes terrible. Very rich but not sweet, my son drinks pedisure protein drinks without an issue, this one he gagged and refused to drink it. I tasted it and don't blame him it's terrible I understand why it's a no refund policy. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: My opinion of this product
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 yrs old and he is so skinny! So he likes eats healthy but he is very specific what he likes to eat 🤦🏽‍♀️😫 exactly, very specific! He needs eat more protein but he doesn’t like eat potatoes or yellow part of the eggs etc. I bought this vitamin to make smoothies and pancakes for him and he loves it!!! He wakes up at morning and he asked : “mom, can you make my favorite smoothie.” And he likes the taste of it! You can add fruits or chocolate powder to mix with the smoothie. I really recommend it 😃
customer_reviews.author: ana arty

customer_reviews.title: Not a great flavor
customer_reviews.text: My son does not like the flavor. The packaging is horrible. It’s so hard to reclose the bag once it’s opened. I’m upset that I can’t return it. It was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: carribe12

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever drank the melted vanilla ice cream from the bottom of your milkshake glass? Because this is how it actually tastes like. I didn’t follow the directions of milk to powder ratio stated on this protein powder bag. I did 2 scoops to 240 ml of milk. Then shake shake! Voila, creamy milkshake ready for my 6 yr old boy. He likes it very much. I haven’t seen staggering results in his weight yet but he is slowly gaining some.
customer_reviews.author: Kreezy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious shake that my kids love to drink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shake for my daughter who is short for her age, I love that it is packed full of vitamins and nutrients and she likes the taste.
customer_reviews.author: NWH

customer_reviews.title: It’s our second container!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase vanilla flavor. I feed it to my son because he is short for his age. He likes it no problem drinking it. I haven’t seen huge change on his height but I have had family members notice that he is growing a bit. I’m not sure how fast ids grow but my family is staring to notice him stretch a little. I’m convinced healthy height is to thank. Very happy and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa De La Rocha

customer_reviews.title: SCAM FRAUD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: BUYERS BEWARE! Horrible scam of a product. All that is in it is protein and a sprinklingnof other proprietary blend vitamins. Will not be buying again. Also tastes horrible. Kids have to gag it down. Horrible and this company should be ashamed of such a scam product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the banana muffin recipe posted on their website. Will be ordering that again just to make those beautiful mini rounds of deliciousness
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son who doesn't get the vitamins he needs because he's particular about his food. He adds this to his banana smoothies and loves the flavor it adds to them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bocanegra

customer_reviews.title: High cost for such little product.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this shake mix, which is a shame because you don’t get a lot for the price. You read “two scoops” and think that’s not so bad. Well the scoop has to at least 2 tablespoons worth of powder. This makes it VERY easy to go through the small bag. The price for what you get isn’t great - bottom line.
customer_reviews.author: ashley grimaldi

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, it does not taste good :-(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we were not able to use the product due to issues with the flavor. Please note that this product is not eligible for any refund or substitution once ordered... We were disappointed with the flavor and are now stuck with unusable product.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like an easy way to get enough protein into my kids - they would eat nothing but fruit and bread if they could. I blended the powder into a shake and they said it was yummy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to smoothies
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for my 9 year old son in his smoothies for 3 days. We have tried a few other protein powders but they taste awful. The taste is good and blends really nicely. (we do use a blender).
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Leduc

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is doing intensive gymnastics and is very peaky with food. So I was concerned about her growth considering the kind of physical activity she does which tends to slow down the height but since she is drinking healthy height protein she is getting back to track and I'm very happy with the results. She is growing even faster than I imagined and she loves the taste of the protein. I just prefer when this was in the bottle compared to the current packaging but the result is the same. IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jules Nkamla

customer_reviews.title: Ooooohhhh my GOD
customer_reviews.text: This product is just amazing. On the 3rd bag for my 2 years old. Everybody notice that he's growing now. I don't really know how to say thanks to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a family member who's child needed an extra boost for growth (height and weight). The product is delicious!! It tastes good by itself and also blended in a smoothie with fruit. I would highly recommend for any families with picky eaters or kids who need supplemental nutrition. Plus it's easy to make! I haven't tried the recipes they have on their website yet but look forward to experimenting.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: My child is very small for a ten year old. He loves the taste of this shake nd it fills him up. I’m waiting to see if there is any results in height and/or weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: It was working good for my son this is the 3rd time I order it. but then I found this white thing inside the package. I don't know what is it?
customer_reviews.author: KevoPonce

customer_reviews.title: Less servings than on package.
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to try this after reading the reviews. I can not yet comment on if the product works. I can say my son drinks it without complaint. However. It says each bag is 14 servings. I measured exactly how they state on the label and I got maybe 8 servings out of the first bag. We ordered 2 and are on our second. (My husband opened it before I could say anything as I would have preferred to return.) For 14 servings it’s pretty expensive but worth it if it works well for your child. However, only getting 8 is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Roelandt

customer_reviews.title: Son doesn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: If your child is used to the nutritional shakes in the bottles, they might not like this. We tried this to replace the pediasure and he will not drink this. I even added Hershey’s chocolate syrup and nesquick and he won’t even touch it. My son is 2 1/2. Will not be re-purchasing. For the price, you might as well get the pediasure. Tastes better and is more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kaori M

customer_reviews.title: My kids don’t like the taste and not returnable
customer_reviews.text: Not returnable!! Purchased this for my 2 girls ages 8 and 12. Both couldn’t stomach the taste even with trying it several different ways In shakes. I think we will just stick to Carnations.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Vanilla tastes pretty good. My picky kid doesn’t mind it. Can’t say she loves it but I blended it with chocolate ice cream and milk to make a black & white milk shake and she drank it without a fight. Score!
customer_reviews.author: CristinaNYC

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good, but that's because it has so much sugar. I decided to go with a more simple protein brand and give it to my son with his smoothies. Less sugar and all the nutrients he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: bad taste
customer_reviews.text: It's quite a small quantity for the price of $35-- but what's worse is that this is un-drinkable. It has a chalky, medical flavor. This isn't the tasty "chocolate milk" your child might be expecting. Nobody in my household wants to drink this unfortunately! I really wanted to support this small company, but the flavor just doesn't cut it and I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: My son could not stand the taste of it ...I also think flavor is off
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth gavin

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for kids who do not like the flavored powders
customer_reviews.text: My kid does not like the flavored powders. This one we can add to smoothies with fruits of his choice and he loves it. I do wish the bag was larger for the price (having to do 2 scoops per serving) but am pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N

customer_reviews.title: Pancake Mix
customer_reviews.text: It’s been one week of trying this product with my 4 year old. The only way she’ll tolerate it, is mixed into pancakes. She can pick out the taste even in a smoothie, yogurt, sprinkled in food etc. (I bought Plain). Can’t give a full review since it has only been a week, but she is eating her pancakes so I’ll update at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! I have a picky toddler and worried if she gets enough nutrients. This helps. My 9 year old loves it, too, it’s a little treat for him.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: It really works and amazingly you can see the results
customer_reviews.text: Great product amd it really works My son is a pocky eater so he looks so thin and i search different brand and came across this brand gave it a try and he gain weight which i thought was a miracle Amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Loc

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate taste delicious and it’s one of the healthier options out in the market.
customer_reviews.text: My son love the taste but bag is small and will not last a month. I will get pricey but you are getting very minimal ingredients which is a big plus for us
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the concept
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept but I can't figure out how to get my kids to drink this. They don't like it in milk or water...and we tried adding it to baked goods like muffins but they didn't like that either. I'm going to keep experimenting since I really want them to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try...
customer_reviews.text: Well....the taste isn't so bad, the little ones definitely knew I added something in there, but after "drink it, drink it! DRINK IT NOW!" they got it down! The scoop was definitely a bit bigger than I expected. Idk if I'll buy it again though, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: magda rubin

customer_reviews.title: Yummy yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves drinking it every morning. She liked the chocolate flavor the best.
customer_reviews.author: Eneyda

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love The Taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 8 and 10 year old kids. They love the taste of the chocolate! I also added a frozen banana and made a smoothie. We haven't had it long enough to see any effects but I'm very happy that they love the flavor. that is a huge hurdle to anything that is "good for them".
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Best ingredients on the market
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of Healthy Height until it was recommended to us by our pediatrician. It's definitely on the pricier side, but you get what you pay for (developed by pediatricians + a clinical study). Ingredients are by far the best of the other kid shake options. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G. Loparo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old loves this product! We mix it in to his oatmeal along with a scoop of peanut butter and banana. This is extremely filling and nutritious and has helped him grow already. We also use it for his protein shakes which make with banana, milk, peanut butter and chia seeds. This is our second time purchasing it and we’ll definitely continue to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: We love Healthy Height
customer_reviews.text: We first decided to give Healthy Height shake mix a try for our son who (since birth has consistently been on the smaller side) had fallen just below the 20% on the growth chart. We didn’t have super high expectations, but were happy with the ingredients and our son really enjoyed his “proteins” every morning. Drinking a shake become a daily part of his morning routine. Flash forward to his most recent check up and he is now between the 25-50%! We will continue to be loyal Healthy Height customers.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Pinch your nose.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is awful. We are a family that drinks nutrition shakes regularly. I figured I’d get this for my picky 4 year old and make vanilla “milkshakes” bc the taste of milk makes him gag but he loves vanilla ice cream milkshakes. I started with just the protein powder and milk blended with a little ice; that was a definite no. I tried adding peanut butter powder to it to mask the flavor of the powder but that didn’t work either. No I have a bag of protein powder that won’t get used. Not worth the $30.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste great with Almond milk.
customer_reviews.text: Pediatrician told me to get this for my son. He loves the taste and easiness of blending it with bananas or berries.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved, Dad thankful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is vertically challenged...must've got his mom's genes on that one. Anyway, we started using Healthy Height and the young one said "Tastes pretty good dad!". Well, that's a good start when a kid says he likes the taste. He/We have tried many protein mixes with most ending with "this tastes like cardboard", so that's good. Truly appreciate the quality of nutritional value compared to some other brands out there. Will continue to buy and thankful for the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy T.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great product.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old has no idea I blended 4 scoops of this powder with an entire gallon of ice cream! in fact, neither does his 9 yr old brother 😂🤣
customer_reviews.author: Jillian J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Height
customer_reviews.text: Our youngest has some health issues, and I wanted a protein shake that wasn’t full of sugar. She does keep gaining weight and growing in height, and she enjoys the chocolate. I add a banana to the shake.
customer_reviews.author: GRE

customer_reviews.title: Good product; Steep cost
customer_reviews.text: Finally found aproduct my kids like and want to drink. However, I just can't afford the cost of constant use with this product. Though, an occasional buy will be done.
customer_reviews.author: Daishiki

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition, but large serving size
customer_reviews.text: While I have a peace of mind that my kid is getting the nutrition and protein, and he likes the flavor, the actual serving size of 2 scoops makes the milk I mix it with a bit too chalky. Also the scooper is big and I tend to spill some powder every time I serve it. I’ve ordered 2 months worth so I’ll see if it’s actually works in the 6 month mark.
customer_reviews.author: Starfish84

customer_reviews.title: Toddler doesnt love it
customer_reviews.text: My toddler doesnt love it but at the same time doesnt hate it. They suggest to add 2 scoops to 4oz of milk(x2 a day) which is tooo much. I am adding only one scoop and he is drinking it. The very first time when I added 2 scoops he almost threw up. One of the mom's suggested to add them to pancake mixture, maybe that is a good way to make them have 4 scoops a day but jsut with milk is IMPOSSIBLE...
customer_reviews.author: Venkat

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder and always recommended it to my fellow parents. My kid loves smoothies for breakfast so I always throw in some of this and not only does it add flavor to the smoothie, I feel good about them getting all the extra good stuff. I’ve also used this in pancake and waffle batters to give them a little extra. Kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a picky eater but our 10 yr. old never complains when we offer him a Healthy Height shake. We mix it with chocolate cream and sometimes add a banana if he has a big game or sweating a lot. We have been using this product almost a year and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT COOPER

customer_reviews.title: My 22 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this shake. We make it with almond milk and he not only asks for his shake every morning, but he doesn't put his sippy down until it's all gone!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for both of my kids (10 and 14). Even though the package recommendation is for younger children both of my children are shorter than their peers. I bought the vanilla and they both love it. I mix it with milk and ice. however, I wish the package was larger!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Vlantis

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: It is really good my kids loves it but I don’t see a different except it is extremely sweet. I won’t be repurchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Hossain

customer_reviews.title: Child disliked taste
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son did not like it. Even disguised in chocolate milk and a lot of chocolate syrup. Couldn’t get him to drink it. I think it’s the whey. He likes my ‘Mass Gainer’ a whole lot better- but that’s for adults. You’d think at 35$ they’d be able to get the flavoring right and adjusted for picky kids cause why else would one be purchasing something in this category.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Kids say it is delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Kids think the chocolate tastes great (and I agree)! First drink they have finished. Only thing I do not love is the packaging. The bag doesn’t seal well so you need to put in another container.
customer_reviews.author: nh10028

product_meta.title: Healthy Height Kids Protein Powder (Vanilla) - Developed by Pediatricians - High in Protein Nutritional Shake to Supplement Child Growth - Contains Key Vitamins & Minerals to Gain Height & Weight
feature_bullets: DEVELOPED BY PEDIATRICIANS. The nutrition in Healthy Height was tested by world-renowned scientists, doctors, and researchers at Schnieder's Children's Hospital. It was clinically shown to help kids grow in height and gain healthy weight without increasing BMI. The clinical study was published in the Journal of Pediatrics.

HELPS KIDS GROW. Our patented shake mix formula contains the right combination of protein, amino acids, vitamins & minerals clinically shown to promote growth. The yummy research-based nutritional drink helps young children grow when consumed daily as part of a balanced diet.

12 GRAMS OF PROTEIN. Contains 12 grams of high-quality whey protein per serving and 350 milligrams of arginine, a key amino acid for growing tall and strong as part of an overall healthy diet. Our healthy kids shakes are gluten free, soy free, and rbST free with only 3 grams of added sugar. No human growth hormone (HGH), corn syrup, artificial colors or flavors, or preservatives included!

SUPPLEMENT A PICKY EATER'S DIET. Kids often say this yummy vanilla flavor reminds them of birthday cake! With this great tasting kids protein powder, your child will get the nutrition they need, with a taste they’ll enjoy. Supplement your child's breakfast, lunch, dinner or bedtime snack with a kid-friendly nutritional shake, or serve in a recipe as a meal.
OUR "YOUR KIDS WILL LOVE IT" PROMISE: Our #1 goal is to help kids grow and we’re committed to making sure you’re 100% happy with your purchase.
